node_1: h.g. wells's the war of the worlds
edge: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen takes part in events of H.G. Wells's The War of the Worlds.
Campion Bond represents British Intelligence in recruiting Mina Murray and others for the League of Extraordinary Gentlemen.
Fu Manchu participates in a gang war with Professor Moriarty, nemesis of Sherlock Holmes.
Professor Moriarty participates in a gang war with Fu Manchu.
Mina Murray achieves immortality after her adventure with the League of Extraordinary Gentlemen.
Allan Quatermain achieves immortality after his adventure with the League of Extraordinary Gentlemen.
Evil magicians create a Moonchild that might turn out to be the Antichrist during an adventure with Mina Murray, Allan Quatermain, and Orlando.
Mina Murray escapes from an Earth dominated by magical entities during her immortal life on a space station with Orlando, Jack Nemo (great-grandson of Captain Nemo), and a clone.
The character is living out her immortal life on a space station.
Orlando is also residing on the space station with the character.
Jack Nemo, who is a great-grandson of Captain Nemo, is present on the space station along with the character.
A clone of Mr. Hyde is also present on the space station as per the context.
The context mentions multiple alien invasions, but despite their presence, the character is able to live out her immortal life unhindered.
The context mentions that there have been various alien invasions, but the space station seems to be a secure location for the character and her companions.
